name: Cuckold Chair Simulator 2023
description:
Welcome to the captivating world of Cuckold Chair Simulator 2023! This unique game combines an intriguing storyline with the engaging gameplay of Idle and Clicker genres.

The story of your hero begins at the rehearsal for the annual sex exhibition, where he tragically met his end. However, his fate doesn't end there - he is reborn in the form of an ordinary chair. But here is where the real adventure begins!

Initially confined to the role of an observer, your hero soon discovers that he can influence the participants of this mysterious festival with the power of his thoughts. It turns out he's not alone in his new form - many other chairs have also become part of this enigmatic world.

The main character realizes that the only way to return to the world of humans is to help all the contestants. You will guide the protagonist through a series of exciting challenges where you'll need to develop your abilities, cooperate with other chairs, and influence the festival participants to help them succeed.

Under your guidance, the hero gradually assembles a team of chairs and uncovers the secrets of this mysterious world. Finally, at the end of the game, he transforms into a real human, concluding his journey with bold victories and unforgettable adventures.

Cuckold Chair Simulator 2023 is an incredibly thrilling game that combines an unconventional storyline, captivating gameplay, and the opportunity to experience that even the most extraordinary circumstances can lead to significant transformations. Join the hero on his captivating path from being a chair to becoming a human!

Features:
  • Simple and engaging clicker gameplay mechanism
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
